articles.author: Erica Pandey
articles.title: Poll: Majority of Americans disapprove of overturning Roe v. Wade - Axios
articles.description: Opinion is starkly divided along party lines.
articles.content: Fifty-nine percent of Americans disapprove of the Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade and take away the federal protections of abortion rights, according to a new CBS News/YouGov reactio… [+712 chars]

articles.author: Luke Goodsell
articles.title: Baz Luhrmann and Austin Butler on Elvis and honouring the 'original superhero' while exposing the dark heart of the American dream - ABC News
articles.description: The Australian director sat down with ABC Arts to talk about shooting through COVID and balancing iconography with humanity in bringing this quintessentially Luhrmann take on Elvis’s 42 years to life.
articles.content: Elvis: he's everywhere and nowhere, a mononym as familiar as Coke and a cipher as abstract as the clichés he came to (dis)embody. Both the King of Rock 'n' Roll and a costume party punchline, the man… [+10917 chars]
